title: Multimedia Mozart: the dissonant quartet (PC)
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Multimedia systems
description: The Dissonant Quartet is an elucidating, captivating exploration of the man and his music, from the emotional dynamics of the String Quartet in C Major, to the historic events in his world, to the expressive beauty of the individual stringed instruments. Experience the power of Mozart's artistry and the intensity of his genius. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: a multimedia PC or compatible with 386SX or higher microprocessor, 2MB of RAM, 30MB of hard-disk, CDROM -drive, audio board and VGA display. Microsoft Windows and MS-DOS operating system, versions 3.1 or later.
